info: The facility will support NCRPB in (i) leveraging its resources through a line of credit and other market access support services, and (ii) implementation support that will focus on design, implementation, and delivery of quality growth-oriented and public health and environmental urban services, enhance capacity to partner with the private sector, and support other capacity enhancements.
name: MFF -National Capital Region Urban Infrastructure Financing Facility -Tranche 1
